title: #53 Gavin McInnes, Mrs. Crowder and Racist Santa!
description: In our end-of-year bash we're joined by an all-star lineup. Gavin McInnes, Elliott Morgan and yes, Mrs. Crowder joins us with her year-end book review. Hint: It's about scientology. Also, we discuss Star Wars with Courtney Kirchoff, and racist Santa makes a few appearances.
